Projects
  • HAL, 2019
    Infrastructure for machine learning research in AWS, with a friendly CLI
  • Named Entity Recognition & Disambiguation (NERD), 2019
    Enables entity/subject recognition and disambiguation, linking to wikidata and other authorities.
  • Wellcome Image Search, 2019
    A broad set of ML-based APIs and services, letting people explore Wellcome Collection through its images.
  • Museums + AI Network, 2019
    Core member of network of UK/US academics and professionals developing policy recommendations for the use of AI/ML in the museum sector.
  • Bookworm, 2017
    Bookworm finds characters in novels and learns their social network, enabling all sorts of fun further analysis
  • Invisible Insights from TripAdvisor, 2016
    Analysed British Museum reviews with deep learning. Collaboration with TripAdvisor, the Oxford Internet Institute, and The Alan Turing Institute.
  • Columbus, 2015
    Recommender system for the Great Little Place app.
  • Modelling correlations between H2O fragments on Si, 2015
    MSci project. High-dimensional density functional theory simulations of novel atomic-scale structures. Heavy use of UNIX-based HPC.
